summary: CAMO RANGER ARMOR AND TWO CAMO BOWS
descriptionHtml:
Standalone Camo Ranger Armor and Two Camo Bows

This Mod adds the camo Nightingale Armor (by mosdefinite) as a Standalone Armor and also 2 Standalone Ranger Bows, with a nice dmg spec, plus matching Carbon Tip Camo Arrows. 
(The armor is slightly better than the nightingale\'s)

The Weapons can be crafted within the misc Section at a forge, and can also be upgraded and the grindstone, or workbench.

(or type \"help camo 0\" into your console for the form IDs and then add with \"player.additem <form-ID> 1\")

-also a 1024 RES version available as optional download.


V 1.1 UPDATE
  
   - Weapons now have less reflections (new normal maps) 


Installation:
===================
Copy the meshes and textures folder, as well as the 2 .esp Files into your skyrim \\data\\ folder.
Enable the ESP within the Data Files option, or by editing the plugins.txt


De-Install:
===================
Delete the copied files from your skyrim Data folder.
Remove the ESP files from Datafiles, or plugins.txt


Issues:
===============
In the inventory, the Armor won\'t have the camo texture, but when you put it on, it will. (anyone tell me how to make the inventory item have the custom textures too?)

Future:
============
Will be modelling totally new looking gear, but that\'s gonna take some time.
Also will have a complete questline, combined with my Carbon Elite gear, some Time- & Dimension-Travel to explain the origin of the modern gear, and some more, which is to be a surprise :D
and might handle any requests...


Enjoy

-rioc
author: rioc
